function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Qualitative research may introduce bias due to subjective approach","Impact":"Inaccurate findings and recommendations","Mitigation":"Use additional quantitative research to validate qualitative findings","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Researchers, hospital staff","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Limited scope of study with focus on nursing managers only","Impact":"Incomplete understanding of pandemic management within hospitals","Mitigation":"Conduct studies involving all segments of staff nurses","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Researchers, hospital administration","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Challenges in crisis management during COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Difficulty in maintaining hospital operations and ensuring safety","Mitigation":"Develop and disseminate integrated crisis management plan, emphasize cooperation and effective communication","Technologies":"Communication systems, crisis management software","People":"Hospital administration, nursing and medical teams","Owner":"Hospital administration"}]}
